location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at a Camp near Shiraz to Captain Charles Sealy, Commander of the HC Cruizer Ternateand Senior Marine Officer in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is granting permission to Captain Sealy to break up the batilla (a small sea going vessel) he captured, so that it may be rendered 'totally unserviceable'.
